scripts.build:cjs: rimraf ../../dist/packages/repoman/cjs && npx tsc src/index.ts --outDir ../../dist/packages/repoman/cjs --lib esnext --moduleResolution node --downlevelIteration --esModuleInterop --target es2022 --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --importHelpers --moduleResolution node --sourceMap --module commonjs --declaration --declarationMap
